subject: Cyber Wiretap And Funds Reco
body:
Cyber Wiretap And Funds Recovery Department,
Federal Bureau Of Investigation FBI
J. Edgar Hoover Building New Washington, D.C
935 Pennsylvania Avenue,
205350001 USA.
Attn: Sir/Madam
This law enforcement agency (FBI) hereby informed you that we have made the Fidelity Asia Bank Limited managements to understand that you cannot be able to come up with such an amount of money in order to complete the transfer of your approved UN Scam Victim Compensation fund valued (US$250,000.00) into your bank account.
 
Right now, we pleaded the Fidelity Asia Bank Limited manager on your behalf and asked him to allow you pay the sum of $500 dollars out of the total required $5,500 dollars so they can release the sum of $50,000.00 into your bank account, so as soon as you receive this part payment of $50,000 dollars so you can pay up the balance of $5,000 dollars to receive the remaining balance of US$200,000.00 dollars immediately after you have confirmed the transfer $50,000:00 dollars into your bank account today.
You're strictly advised to send down this us$500 by MoneyGram or Western Union as soon as you receive this email today to enable the Fidelity Asia Bank Limited to complete the final account crediting of your approved part payment of $50,000 dollars into your bank account before the end of today. 
We promise you that your part payment of $50,000 dollars must be released into your bank account immediately after this payment today.
Officially Sealed.
Mr. Ryan T. Young
Executive Assistant Director (FBI)

subject: Re:   Cyber Wiretap And Funds Reco
body:
Hello Mr. Ryan T. Young,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite a surprise to hear about this situation, I must say.

I'm curious, could you please explain more about how the Fidelity Asia Bank Limited got involved in my case? And what is the role of the UN in all of this?

Also, I would like to understand better why there is a need for me to pay a certain amount first before receiving the approved funds? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Norma
